content: for round 13 p1 k2tog k2 yo k3 yo k2 ssk to working in the round being careful not to end twist your stitches round 14 same as round 6 round 1 k1 p1 to end of round round 15 same as round 7 repeat this round 3 more times break the rounds 16 18 20 p1 k11 to end strand that belongs to the smaller ball round 17 same as round 5 round 19 same as round 3 start lace repeat rounds 1-20 for a total of 4 repeats or change to larger needles until you reach your desired length for this section you need to change your remembering you change your cc every 14 contrasting color every 14 rounds to do so rounds just break the thread of contrasting color that you were using and join in the new one always carrying your main color throughout final ribbing your project switch to smaller needles i made my final charted instructions ribbing carrying 1 thread of main color and the contrasting color i used for my last repeat round 1 with a strand of mc and a strand of of the lace you can do this or you can break your first companion color work row 1 of the your cc and join in a second strand of your lace chart and repeat to end of round main color again continue knitting in this manner always next round k1 p1 to end working the next row of the chart in the round until you have completed the chart 4 times repeat this round 3 more times and on the or until you reach your desired length foll round bobble all sts in pattern remembering to change your cc every 14 rounds written instructions round 1 p1 yo k2 ssk k3 k2tog k2 yo to end rounds 2 4 p1 k11 to end round 3 p1 k1 yo k2 ssk k1 k2tog k2 yo k1 to end round 5 p1 k2 yo k2 s2kp k2 yo k2 to end round 6 p1 k11 to 1 st before end slip last st to the right needle remove marker place the slipped st back on the left needle replace marker round 7 s2kp k2 yo k5 yo k2 to end 5 6 abbreviations co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 together patt pattern p purl s2kp slip 2 as if to k2tog k1 pass slipped sts over sl slip ssk slip slip knit the slipped sts together through the back loop decrease st sts stitch stitches yo yarn over 7 knitting is also my way of saying thank you i d love it if you share this project on instagram #knitfreecowl for pattern support you can contact me at designsbyjoji@gmail com www jojiknits com 8
